about_the_game:
Embark on an intergalactic journey unlike any other in Zodchy, a groundbreaking MMO experience that seamlessly blends RPG, survival, and action elements in a thrilling sci-fi narrative centered around planetary colonization. Set foot on uncharted planets, each brimming with unique biomes, mysterious creatures, and untold dangers. With every server representing a new frontier, forge your destiny amidst the stars.


Discover vast, procedurally generated planets that promise boundless discovery and adventure. Traverse diverse landscapes, from verdant forests teeming with exotic flora and fauna to desolate wastelands hiding ancient secrets beneath their barren surface. Uncover hidden caves, soaring mountain ranges, and expansive oceans, each offering its own set of challenges and rewards. With every step you take, the universe unfolds before you, inviting you to delve deeper into the secrets of each planet as you uncover hidden ruins, alien artifacts, and remnants of past civilizations. Unravel the mysteries of the cosmos and unlock the secrets of your own existence.




In this harsh environment, every decision counts. Gather resources, hunt for sustenance, and fortify your position against the elements and hostile forces. Build shelters, craft tools, and adapt to the challenges of each environment to ensure your survival. Stake your claim in the universe by establishing your homestead. Design and construct your dream colony, from humble shelters to sprawling settlements. Grow crops, raise livestock, and develop thriving communities with fellow colonists.




In the vast expanse of space, players have the opportunity to shape their destiny through collaboration or competition. Claim your piece of the cosmos by settling down and building homes or settlements with friends, pooling resources and talents to create thriving communities.
But watch out for the challenges that come your way. Hostile settlements and raiders lurk on the fringes, eager to challenge your claim and take what's yours. Engage in battles and sieges as you defend your territory and fight for valuable resources.
In addition to player interactions, various NPC factions inhabit the cosmos, each with their own settlements and agendas. Forge alliances with these factions for mutual benefit or challenge them for control over territory and resources.
The choice is yours: will you work together with others to build a better future, or will you embrace the challenges of competition and conflict? The fate of your corner of the universe lies in your hands.


Hone your abilities through a robust skill system that rewards your actions. As you wield different weapons, you gain skill points in that weapon class, unlocking passive and active abilities that enhance your combat prowess. Engage in various in-game actions to earn craft skill points, improving your crafting abilities and unlocking new recipes and techniques. Both skill systems feature intricate skill trees, allowing you to tailor your character's development to suit your playstyle and preferences.


Explore the cosmos alongside fellow adventurers on official servers meticulously crafted by the development team, offering a curated experience designed to immerse you in the heart of the Zodchy universe. But the journey doesn't end there. We empower players to shape their own destinies by creating and customizing their own servers. Whether you're seeking a PvE paradise where collaboration thrives or a PvP battleground where only the strongest survive, the choice is yours. Join forces with friends or forge new alliances as you embark on an epic voyage through the stars, with dedicated servers ensuring that every player finds their place among the stars.
